description:
Free Toggle is a customizable toggle switch element that brings modern UI interactions to your Bubble app. This plugin offers a sleek and responsive toggle switch with smooth animations and color customization options.
Key features:

Clean and modern design
Customizable colors
Smooth transition animations
Fully responsive and resizable
Built-in preset states (Checked, Unchecked, Autobinding)
Easy to implement and use

Perfect for settings pages, preference toggles, on/off switches, and any interface that requires binary state controls. Simply drag and drop the element onto your page and customize its appearance to match your app's design.
name: Free Toggle
plugin_instructions: Simply drag and drop the element onto your page and customize its appearance to match your app's design.
